transArray.content: The location is great. It's on Qianmen Street. You can walk to Tiananmen Square and the Forbidden City. The room is very small, which is understandable in the city center. The auntie took away all the face towels when cleaning. ðŸ˜”The hygienic situation is not particularly good. The window sills are all dusty, which may also be due to the street.
